name: Ancient Red-Mane Boar
description: An ancient species of forest boar, larger in size, boasting a crimson mane, and much more aggressive than its wild counterparts.\nUnlike its kin, when residing in the Realm Within, the Ancient Red-Mane Boar does not flee at the sight of humans, but rather eagerly approaches them. However, this does not mean Paimon's attempts at riding them were successful â€” after all, she was merely dragged along against her will, which hardly qualifies as riding...
